title: London's Morning Gloryville Starts Sunrise Rave Trend
teaser: It's a typical rave scene, except everyone is sober and it's 7 a.m. on a weekday. Morning Gloryville is a monthly surprise party. (This piece initially aired August 12, 2014 on Morning Edition).
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
